DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To determine differential effectiveness integrate care ( IC ) low extremity strength training ( LEST ) among community-dwelling frail older adult Taiwan . Method : The investigator randomize participant Bei-Hu site `` Intervention study Geriatric Frailty , Osteoporosis , Depression Community Based Randomized Trial '' 12 week either IC LEST . Outcome assessment perform baseline , 12 week 6 month initiation intervention . Interventions : 1 . IC : Participants visit study site health education , social activity , warm , stretch , low intensity resistance exercise 1 hour per week . If medical problem functional decline suspect visit , case manager refers participant primary care physicians management . 2 . LEST : Participants receive 2 session 30-minute low extremity strength strain use isotonic strength training machine week . The intensity set 60-80 % 1 repetition maximum ( RM ) . Evaluation exercise protocol repeat every 2 week individualized adjustment
